summary: This document is an internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding the approved press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death. It contains instructions for distributing the PDF version to media and mentions that about 50 reporters had contacted the Office of Public Affairs.

events.title: Approval and Distribution of Epstein Death Press Release
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons finalizes and approves a press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, with instructions to distribute the PDF version to approximately 50 reporters who had contacted the Office of Public Affairs.

locations.name: MCC New York
locations.context: Metropolitan Correctional Center where Jeffrey Epstein was held and died.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons dated August 10, 2019.
It concerns the approved press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death, with instructions to release only the PDF version.
Approximately 50 reporters had contacted the Office of Public Affairs (OPA) about the case.
The email indicates coordination between the Public Information Office and MCC New York for media distribution.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY evidence files (SDNY_00012663, EFTA00139930).
